      • pixelToCoord

        public static Coordinates pixelToCoord(int x,
                       int y,
                       java.awt.Dimension image)
        converts from pixel to Coordinates. it assumes pixel (0,0) is the upper left pixel. it has the coordinate 450'000/100'000
        Parameters:
        x - the point on the x axis
        y - the point on the y axis
        totWidth - the total length of the map in pixels
        totWidth - the total Height of the map in pixels
        Returns:
        a Coordinate object with the desired Coordinates.
